title: Whole Farm Assessment of Nutrient Extraction from Dairy Manure

tasks.task: Describe the tasks related to farm management and nutrient extraction technologies as discussed in the transcript.
subtasks: Explain the role of the agricultural engineer in evaluating nutrient extraction methods.
Detail the development of a whole farm assessment model for phosphorus extraction using a decanter centrifuge.
Illustrate how the integrated farm system model simulates nutrient flows and various environmental impacts.
Compare the economic and environmental impacts of different manure handling systems (flush versus scrape) on a dairy farm.
Assess the feasibility and costs of using a decanter centrifuge on a large dairy farm with excess phosphorus.

tasks.task: Discuss the conclusions drawn from the study on phosphorus extraction technologies.
subtasks: Evaluate the economic viability of using a decanter centrifuge with a flush system versus a scrape system.
Analyze the effects of manure handling system changes on transportation costs and nutrient distribution.
Consider the environmental benefits and challenges of using concentrated phosphorus extracted from manure.

tasks.task: First, the MAINTASK needs to cover the overall topic of describing the tasks related to farm management and nutrient extraction technologies discussed in the transcript. Under that, I'll list subtasks that detail specific aspects mentioned.
Discuss the tasks involved in assessing the impacts of phosphorus extraction technologies on dairy farms.
Assess the impacts of phosphorus extraction technologies on dairy farms through modeling and economic analysis.
MAINTASK: Assess the impacts of phosphorus extraction technologies on dairy farms through modeling and economic analysis.
subtasks: - Develop a whole farm assessment model for phosphorus extraction using the integrated farm system model (SUBTASK).
- Simulate nutrient flows and environmental impacts (e.g., GHG emissions, energy use, runoff) on a dairy farm (SUBTASK).
- Compare the costs and benefits of using a decanter centrifuge with flush versus scrape manure systems (SUBTASK).
- Analyze the influence of manure handling systems on transportation and labor costs (SUBTASK).
- Evaluate the environmental footprint of phosphorus extraction technologies using lifecycle assessment (SUBTASK).
- Assess the economic viability of phosphorus extraction for managing excess nutrients on reduced farm acreage (SUBTASK).
- Consider the cradle-to-farm-gate lifecycle impacts of manure management practices (SUBTASK).
